BNC User Reference Guide

<revisionDesc>

revisionDesc (revision description) summarizes the revision history for a file.
Declaration 
element revisionDesc { change+ }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <revisionDesc
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <change date="2006-10-21" who="#OUCS">Tag usage updated for BNC-XML</change>..</revisionDesc>
Note

Record changes with most recent changes at the top of the list.
;
Module header
